transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye.

Executive: Haan madam, good afternoon madam.

Customer: Ji good afternoon sir.

Customer: Madam main Bela Stone Bela Stone ka main manager baat kar raha hun main.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Madam ye jo abhi main India Mart ka mera add jo khol ke humne dekha hai to usme sirf aur sirf jo buylead show kar rahi hai wo sirf aur sirf do hi aa rahi hai aur do ke baad me hum upar kar rahe hain koi bhi buylead usme show nahi kar rahi hai.

Executive: Recent leads pe bhi nahi show kar rahi hai sir?

Customer: Kuch nahi kar rahi hai recent na past na catalog view catalog view me to chalo theek hai wo dikha de raha hai lekin Priyanshu ji Priyanshu ji hai hamare jo manager wo jo.

Executive: Sir ek cheez main bata deti hun aaj chutti hai aaj chutti hai Saturday Sunday off rehta hai to is vajah se phone unka transfer ho gaya aapko fir ek kam system to main available nahi hun main kahin bahar thi ek bar na main jab system pe free hoti hun to check karke ek bar aapko update karti hun sir kyuki aaj to chutti hai na hamara.

Customer: Aap turant aap mujhe madam update kijiye kyuki business hame nahi milega to hame itna bada package lene ka fayda kya hai batao aap.

Executive: Nahi nahi isko main ek bar check karwati hun main priority pe ho jati hun theek hai sir.

Customer: Check karwaiye aap isko jald se jald aur nahi to fir dekho kam agar nahi hoga hamara to fir idhar fayda kya hai service lene se itni badi.

Executive: Nahi nahi isme koi issue nahi aayega main isko check karwati hun theek hai sir main dekhti hun isko.

Customer: Kab tak main aapke call ka main intzar karu.

Executive: Main main aapko batati hun main hun bahar main pahunchungi sham ko raat me theek hai number aapke pass hai to aap usko call kar lijiye agar wo system pe kyuki aaj hamara Saturday Sunday off rehta hai system pe available ho hi nahi pate hain problem ye hai.

Customer: Theek hai madam.

Executive: Office khulega Monday ko theek hai to main agar jaldi free ho jaungi to main aap call kar lungi otherwise Priyanshu ka agar personal number hai to aap ek bar us pe kar lijiye call theek hai.

Customer: Nahi utha raha na isliye nahi kar raha banda.

Executive: Kahin bahar hoga sir problem ye hai.

Executive: Aaj chutti hai na isliye.

Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai madam theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Wants immediate resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Suggested calling Priyanshu on personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, technical issue
